results.title: Effect of simvastatin on endothelial function in cardiac syndrome X patients.
results.text_hl: Effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on endothelial function in @<m>DISEASE_Microvascular_Angina</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017566 @@@cardiac syndrome X@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

results.title: Combined donor simvastatin and methylprednisolone treatment prevents ischemia-reperfusion injury in rat cardiac allografts through vasculoprotection and immunomodulation.
results.text_hl: Here, we investigated the effect of donor treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Methylprednisolone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008775 @@@methylprednisolone@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Microvascular_Angina</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017566 @@@microvascular dysfunction@@@ and immunomodulation during @DISEASE_Reperfusion_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D015427 @@@IRI@@@ in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ cardiac allografts subjected to prolonged @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@ time.

citations.NLM: Tuuminen R, Syrjälä S, Krebs R, Arnaudova R, Rouvinen E, Nykänen AI, Lemström KB. Combined donor simvastatin and methylprednisolone treatment prevents ischemia-reperfusion injury in rat cardiac allografts through vasculoprotection and immunomodulation. Transplantation. 2013 May 15;95(9):1084-91. PMID: 23466635

results.title: Donor simvastatin treatment abolishes rat cardiac allograft ischemia/reperfusion injury and chronic rejection through microvascular protection.
results.text_hl: METHODS AND RESULTS: Here, we report that @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ @DISEASE_Reperfusion_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D015427 @@@cardiac allograft ischemia/reperfusion injury@@@ resulted in profound @<m>DISEASE_Microvascular_Angina</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017566 @@@microvascular dysfunction@@@ that was prevented by donor treatment with peroral single-dose @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, a @GENE_HMGCR @GENE_25675 @@@3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl coenzyme A reductase@@@ and Rho GTPase inhibitor, 2 hours before graft procurement.

citations.NLM: Tuuminen R, Syrjälä S, Krebs R, Keränen MA, Koli K, Abo-Ramadan U, Neuvonen PJ, Tikkanen JM, Nykänen AI, Lemström KB. Donor simvastatin treatment abolishes rat cardiac allograft ischemia/reperfusion injury and chronic rejection through microvascular protection. Circulation. 2011 Sep 6;124(10):1138-50. PMID: 21844074

results.title: Simvastatin prevents coronary microvascular remodeling in renovascular hypertensive pigs.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ prevents @<m>DISEASE_Microvascular_Angina</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017566 @@@myocardial microvascular remodeling@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypertrophy @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@hypertrophy@@@ in experimental @DISEASE_Hypertension_Renovascular @DISEASE_MESH:D006978 @@@RVH@@@ independent of @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ lowering.

results.title: Donor simvastatin treatment prevents ischemia-reperfusion and acute kidney injury by preserving microvascular barrier function.
results.text_hl: We used @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ renal artery clamping and transplantation models to investigate @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@-independent effects of clinically relevant single-dose peroral @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment 2 h before @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@renal ischemia@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Microvascular_Angina</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017566 @@@microvascular injury@@@.

citations.NLM: Tuuminen R, Nykänen AI, Saharinen P, Gautam P, Keränen MA, Arnaudova R, Rouvinen E, Helin H, Tammi R, Rilla K, Krebs R, Lemström KB. Donor simvastatin treatment prevents ischemia-reperfusion and acute kidney injury by preserving microvascular barrier function. Am J Transplant. 2013 Aug;13(8):2019-34. PMID: 23773358

results.title: Early antithrombotic and anti-inflammatory effects of simvastatin versus fenofibrate in patients with hypercholesterolemia.
results.text_hl: Soluble @GENE_SELP @GENE_6403 @@@P-selectin@@@ was lowered only in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group. The total amount of @GENE_F2 @GENE_2147 @@@thrombin@@@ generated at the site of @<m>DISEASE_Microvascular_Angina</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017566 @@@microvascular injury@@@ also declined (by about 30%) as early as after 3 days of @CHEMICAL_Fenofibrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011345 @@@fenofibrate@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ therapy, whereas @GENE_PPBP @GENE_5473 @@@beta TG@@@ release was reduced only in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group on days 3 and 28.

citations.NLM: Undas A, Celinska-Löwenhoff M, Domagala TB, Iwaniec T, Dropinski J, Löwenhoff T, Szczeklik A. Early antithrombotic and anti-inflammatory effects of simvastatin versus fenofibrate in patients with hypercholesterolemia. Thromb Haemost. 2005 Jul;94(1):193-9. PMID: 16113803

results.title: Novel therapies for microvascular permeability in sepsis.
results.text_hl: We have characterized several mediators of endothelial cell (EC) barrier function that may serve as novel therapies for @DISEASE_Sepsis @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@sepsis@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Microvascular_Angina</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017566 @@@microvascular dysfunction@@@ including @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Adenosine_Triphosphate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000255 @@@adenosine triphosphate@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Adenosine_Triphosphate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000255 @@@ATP@@@), @CHEMICAL_sphingosine_1_phosphate @CHEMICAL_MESH:C060506 @@@sphingosine 1-phosphate@@@ (@CHEMICAL_sphingosine_1_phosphate @CHEMICAL_MESH:C060506 @@@S1P@@@), and @GENE_APC @GENE_324 @@@activated protein C@@@ (@GENE_APC @GENE_324 @@@APC@@@).

citations.NLM: Jacobson JR, Garcia JG. Novel therapies for microvascular permeability in sepsis. Curr Drug Targets. 2007 Apr;8(4):509-14. PMID: 17430121

results.title: Simvastatin depresses blood clotting by inhibiting activation of prothrombin, factor V, and factor XIII and by enhancing factor Va inactivation.
results.text_hl: The aim of this study was to evaluate the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on the @DISEASE_Blood_Coagulation_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D001778 @@@coagulation@@@ process at sites of @<m>DISEASE_Microvascular_Angina</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017566 @@@microvascular injury@@@.

citations.NLM: Undas A, Brummel KE, Musial J, Mann KG, Szczeklik A. Simvastatin depresses blood clotting by inhibiting activation of prothrombin, factor V, and factor XIII and by enhancing factor Va inactivation. Circulation. 2001 May 8;103(18):2248-53. PMID: 11342472

results.title: Antithrombotic actions of statins.
results.text_hl: In @SPECIES_9606 @@@men@@@ with marked @DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@, lowering serum @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ by a three-month @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment is accompanied by a reduction of @GENE_F2 @GENE_2147 @@@thrombin@@@ generation both at basal conditions in venous blood and after activation of hemostasis by @<m>DISEASE_Microvascular_Angina</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017566 @@@microvascular injury@@@.

citations.NLM: Szczeklik A, Undas A, Musial J, Gajewski P, Swadzba J, Jankowski M. Antithrombotic actions of statins. Med Sci Monit. 2001 Nov-Dec;7(6):1381-5. PMID: 11687759
